title: Quapaw Nation Secretary-Treasurer recognized with leadership award for tribal finance work - Tahlequah Daily Press
content: Quapaw Nation Secretary-Treasurer recognized with leadership award for tribal finance work  Tahlequah Daily Press
description: SEATTLE, Washington - Quapaw Nation Secretary-Treasurer Guy Barker was named Tribal Executive of the Year at NAFOA's 40th annual leadership awards conference in Seattle.
